trans-unit.source: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="bb089bf5-9c10-4c0b-97f2-146b2f5efb8a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Examples</link> for the latest JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="bb089bf5-9c10-4c0b-97f2-146b2f5efb8a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Examples</link> for the latest JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: This topic has the following examples:
trans-unit.target: This topic has the following examples:

trans-unit.source: Simple copy from a SqlSource to BlobSink
trans-unit.target: Simple copy from a SqlSource to BlobSink

trans-unit.source: In the following example, source type is set to <embeddedLabel>SqlSource</embeddedLabel> and sink type is set to <embeddedLabel>BlobSink</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In the following example, source type is set to <embeddedLabel>SqlSource</embeddedLabel> and sink type is set to <embeddedLabel>BlobSink</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the Copy Activity is configured to use one of the <link xlink:href="ce76160a-90f2-4459-950a-34c43d8c919b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Data Factory Functions</link>.
trans-unit.target: In the following example, the Copy Activity is configured to use one of the <link xlink:href="ce76160a-90f2-4459-950a-34c43d8c919b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Data Factory Functions</link>.

trans-unit.source: A pipeline with Hive and Copy activities
trans-unit.target: A pipeline with Hive and Copy activities

trans-unit.source: The following sample pipeline has two activities – Hive and Copy.
trans-unit.target: The following sample pipeline has two activities – Hive and Copy.
